long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension to study or work with Pomodoro Technique. Basically extension have timer which work on the Pomodoro technique principle. It uses a timer to break work into intervals, traditionally 25 minutes in length, separated by short 5 minutes breaks.
